value.title: Draw Average Line in Power BI #Shorts
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Power BI Trick and Tip. During this #Shorts we will learn how we can add an Average Line to our Power BI Graph. We can draw the Average Line for Power BI Cluster Column Chart, Cluster Bar Chart, Area Chart, and Line Chart. To add the Average Line the Procedure is very simple and easy.

value.excerpt: Welcome to new Power BI Desktop Updates for March 2021. During this session, we will learn how we can draw Constant Line for X- Axis for Line Chart in Power BI. Microsoft recently introduce this new feature during March 2021 of Power BI Desktop update!   When we have date or number data type as columns,

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to
